scan_add.title: Select Online Devices
scan_add.description:
Include: Monitor only selected devices.
Exclude: Monitor all online devices except the selected ones.

custom_add.title: Custom Configuration Rules
custom_add.description:
Enter IP/MAC or select Subnets. Supports 'Address#Buffer:Name' format to specify buffer and name individually.
Examples:
192.168.1.5
192.168.1.6#8 (buffer 8 times)
192.168.1.7#0:MyPC (buffer 0 means use global default, name MyPC)
AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF#3:Phone
Subnet: 192.168.1.0/24#3 (All IPs in subnet, buffer 3 times)

manage_devices.title: Manage Devices (Confirm List)
manage_devices.description:
Confirm the final device list.
The first box is for **Name**, the second for **Disconnect Buffer**.
Leave buffer empty or set to 0 to use the global default.
Global default buffer: {global_default} times

init.title: Select Action
init.description: Currently in UI Mode. Switching to Const mode requires manual integration reload.

scan_add.title: Scan & Append Devices
scan_add.description:
Select devices to append for monitoring. Include mode adds new devices, Exclude mode removes from current list. Configured devices are auto-filled.
{loading_hint}

custom_add.title: Manually Append Devices
custom_add.description:
Newly entered devices will be appended to existing list. Buffer set to 0 means use global default.
Configured devices are shown in input boxes and can be edited. Leave all inputs empty and click Next to skip changes.

manage_devices.title: Manage Devices (Modify Parameters)
manage_devices.description:
Modify name and buffer settings for monitored devices.
Leave the second box empty or set to 0 to use the global default.
Global default buffer: {global_default} times
